description:
These all-mountain boots will underwrite your quest for touring fit and performance. The Radical Pro Ski Boot hike up like light touring boots and ski down like nimble downhill chargers. With 60 degrees of motion, they feel easy and natural on a long hike up. Thermoformable liners tune the fit with precision, and the shells are light enough to encourage you to climb high into the alpine for an epic top to bottom line.

  • Grilamid shell, cuff and spoiler made with glass fibers to add lightweight stiffness
  • Hoji Lock uses sliding tongue-in-groove to create a firm connection in ski mode
  • Hoji Lock allows you to go from walk to ski with a single lever – for real
  • Ultra-Lock system locks the cuff for stiffness when skiing and less friction when walking
  • Micro-adjustable buckles ensure a perfect fit
  • 11 degrees of forward lean in ski mode provides a solid stance
  • Range of motion in walk mode is 60 degrees
  • Progressive forward flex of 120 is ideal for charging steep and challenging lines
  • Compatible with all hybrid, alpine and pin bindings
name: Dynafit Radical Pro Ski Boots - Unisex
